languages.text: "И все — для того, чтобы не дать вашим гниющим душам истлеть в опаляющей скверне Сай'лантреш". {n}Ирлиэт буквально выплевывает слова.{/n} "День за днем, столетие за столетием, вы гонитесь за чужими страданиями в надежде когда-нибудь перестать слышать шепот Той, Что Жаждет".

traits.locale_text: "И все — для того, чтобы не дать вашим гниющим душам истлеть в опаляющей скверне Сай'лантреш". {n}Ирлиэт буквально выплевывает слова.{/n} "День за днем, столетие за столетием, вы гонитесь за чужими страданиями в надежде когда-нибудь перестать слышать шепот Той, Что Жаждет".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "And it is all to prevent your putrescent souls from wasting away in the scorching corruption of Sai'lanthresh." {n}Yrliet practically spits out her words.{/n} "Day after day, century after century, you chase after the torment of others in hopes that the whispers of She Who Thirsts might fade from your ears at last."
languages.original_text: "И все — для того, чтобы не дать вашим гниющим душам истлеть в опаляющей скверне Сай'лантреш". {n}Ирлиэт буквально выплевывает слова.{/n} "День за днем, столетие за столетием, вы гонитесь за чужими страданиями в надежде когда-нибудь перестать слышать шепот Той, Что Жаждет".

traits.locale_text: "And it is all to prevent your putrescent souls from wasting away in the scorching taint of Sai'lanthresh." {n}Yrliet practically spits out her words.{/n} "Day after day, century after century, you chase after the torment of others in hopes that the whispers of She Who Thirsts may fade away at last."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And it is all to prevent your putrescent souls from wasting away in the scorching taint of Sai'lanthresh." {n}Yrliet practically spits out her words.{/n} "Day after day, century after century, you chase after the torment of others in hopes that the whispers of She Who Thirsts may fade away at last."

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And it is all to prevent your putrescent souls from wasting away in the scorching corruption of Sai'lanthresh." {n}Yrliet practically spits out her words.{/n} "Day after day, century after century, you chase after the torment of others in hopes that the whispers of She Who Thirsts might fade from your ears at last."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “而这一切，不过是为了保护你们腐朽的灵魂，以免它们在赛·兰斯雷什炽热的腐化中湮灭。”{n}伊莉耶特几乎是咬牙切齿地吐出了这些话。{/n}“日复一日，年复一年，你们渴求着他人的痛苦，期望饥渴女士的低语最终能从你们耳边消失。”
languages.original_text: "And it is all to prevent your putrescent souls from wasting away in the scorching corruption of Sai'lanthresh." {n}Yrliet practically spits out her words.{/n} "Day after day, century after century, you chase after the torment of others in hopes that the whispers of She Who Thirsts might fade from your ears at last."

traits.locale_text: “而这一切，不过是为了保护你们腐朽的灵魂，以免它们在赛·兰斯雷什炽热的腐化中湮灭。”{n}伊莉耶特几乎是咬牙切齿地吐出了这些话。{/n}“日复一日，年复一年，你们渴求着他人的痛苦，期望饥渴女士的低语最终能从你们耳边消失。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Y es todo para evitar que vuestras pútridas almas se disuelvan en la corrupción ardiente de Sai'lanthresh». {n}Yrliet prácticamente escupe las palabras.{/n} «Día tras día, siglo tras siglo, buscáis el tormento ajeno con la esperanza de que los susurros de la Sedienta desaparezca por fin de vuestros oídos».
languages.original_text: "And it is all to prevent your putrescent souls from wasting away in the scorching corruption of Sai'lanthresh." {n}Yrliet practically spits out her words.{/n} "Day after day, century after century, you chase after the torment of others in hopes that the whispers of She Who Thirsts might fade from your ears at last."

traits.locale_text: «Y es todo para evitar que vuestras pútridas almas se disuelvan en la corrupción ardiente de Sai'lanthresh». {n}Yrliet prácticamente escupe las palabras.{/n} «Día tras día, siglo tras siglo, buscáis el tormento ajeno con la esperanza de que los susurros de la Sedienta desaparezca por fin de vuestros oídos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「その腐った魂が、セランスレッシュの腐朽に焼かれてさらに衰弱していくのを防ぐだけではないか」{n}ユリエットはほとんど吐き捨てるように言う。{/n}「来る日も来る日も、何世紀巡ろうとも、他者の苦痛を追いかけ回してばかりだ。〈かの渇きたる女〉のささやきが最後には耳から消えるかもしれないと期待して」
languages.original_text: "And it is all to prevent your putrescent souls from wasting away in the scorching corruption of Sai'lanthresh." {n}Yrliet practically spits out her words.{/n} "Day after day, century after century, you chase after the torment of others in hopes that the whispers of She Who Thirsts might fade from your ears at last."

traits.locale_text: 「その腐った魂が、セランスレッシュの腐朽に焼かれてさらに衰弱していくのを防ぐだけではないか」{n}ユリエットはほとんど吐き捨てるように言う。{/n}「来る日も来る日も、何世紀巡ろうとも、他者の苦痛を追いかけ回してばかりだ。〈かの渇きたる女〉のささやきが最後には耳から消えるかもしれないと期待して」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Tout cela pour empêcher vos âmes putrides de dépérir dans la corruption dévorante de Sai'lanthresh, {n}dit Yrliet en crachant presque ses mots.{/n} Jour après jour, siècle après siècle, vous pourchassez le tourment des autres dans l'espoir que les murmures de l'Assoiffée s'estomperont. »
languages.original_text: "And it is all to prevent your putrescent souls from wasting away in the scorching corruption of Sai'lanthresh." {n}Yrliet practically spits out her words.{/n} "Day after day, century after century, you chase after the torment of others in hopes that the whispers of She Who Thirsts might fade from your ears at last."

traits.locale_text: « Tout cela pour empêcher vos âmes putrides de dépérir dans la corruption dévorante de Sai'lanthresh, {n}dit Yrliet en crachant presque ses mots.{/n} Jour après jour, siècle après siècle, vous pourchassez le tourment des autres dans l'espoir que les murmures de l'Assoiffée s'estomperont. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Und das alles soll verhindern, dass Eure verfaulten Seelen nicht in der sengenden Verderbnis von Sai'lanthresh verrotten." {n}Yrliet spuckt die Worte praktisch aus.{/n} "Tag um Tag, Jahrhundert um Jahrhundert, jagt Ihr dem Schmerz anderer nach und hofft darauf, dass das Flüstern von Ihr, die dürstet, endlich aus Euren Ohren schwindet."
languages.original_text: "And it is all to prevent your putrescent souls from wasting away in the scorching corruption of Sai'lanthresh." {n}Yrliet practically spits out her words.{/n} "Day after day, century after century, you chase after the torment of others in hopes that the whispers of She Who Thirsts might fade from your ears at last."

traits.locale_text: "Und das alles soll verhindern, dass Eure verfaulten Seelen nicht in der sengenden Verderbnis von Sai'lanthresh verrotten." {n}Yrliet spuckt die Worte praktisch aus.{/n} "Tag um Tag, Jahrhundert um Jahrhundert, jagt Ihr dem Schmerz anderer nach und hofft darauf, dass das Flüstern von Ihr, die dürstet, endlich aus Euren Ohren schwindet."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "And it is all to prevent your putrescent souls from wasting away in the scorching corruption of Sai'lanthresh." {n}Yrliet practically spits out her words.{/n} "Day after day, century after century, you chase after the torment of others in hopes that the whispers of She Who Thirsts might fade from your ears at last."

languages.text: "Tüm bunları, rezil ruhlarınızın Sai'lanthresh'in kasıp kavuran yozlaşmasında yitip gitmemesi için yapıyorsunuz." {n}Yrliet öfkeyle çıkışıyor.{/n} "Her geçen gün, her geçen yüzyıl Susayan'ın fısıltılarından azat edilebilmek için başkalarının ızdırabıyla kendinizi meşgul etmeye çabalıyorsunuz."
languages.original_text: "And it is all to prevent your putrescent souls from wasting away in the scorching corruption of Sai'lanthresh." {n}Yrliet practically spits out her words.{/n} "Day after day, century after century, you chase after the torment of others in hopes that the whispers of She Who Thirsts might fade from your ears at last."

traits.locale_text: "Tüm bunları, rezil ruhlarınızın Sai'lanthresh'in kasıp kavuran yozlaşmasında yitip gitmemesi için yapıyorsunuz." {n}Yrliet öfkeyle çıkışıyor.{/n} "Her geçen gün, her geçen yüzyıl Susayan'ın fısıltılarından azat edilebilmek için başkalarının ızdırabıyla kendinizi meşgul etmeye çabalıyorsunuz."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
